name: Jelly On The Beat
description:
Yo! This is Jelly on the beat and now I'll show you how to be as cool as me

Catch the rhythm and manage to stay on the platforms, and also try your hand at inversion mode and ULTRA-Tapping, good luck, daredevils!

Control: WASD or arrows 

Important things:

  • Play the game in the Fullscreen 
  • Pay attention to platforms after tap mechanics, wait for a new platform to appear and than go ahead! yeee
  • Don't forget to show all your tap power at the Ultra-tapping mechanic 

All assets (art / code / sounds / music / effects) were created during the Mini Jam 107: Music²

Have fun, drink enough water and be happy!
